sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Agricultural Statistics Act.

sections.heading: The Department of Agriculture shall collect, compile, systematize,
sections.text:
tabulate and publish statistical information relating to agriculture. Said
Department is authorized to cooperate with the United States Department of
Agriculture to accomplish the purposes of this Act.

sections.heading: Each owner of farm land or his agent or tenant shall report the
sections.text: information sought by the Department of Agriculture pursuant to this Act.

sections.heading: "An Act in relation to the collection of agricultural
sections.text:
statistics," approved June 28, 1919, and "An Act in relation to
agricultural statistics and reports, and making an appropriation
therefor," approved June 17, 1929, are repealed.
